channel.title: reflections on MHTN Lab
channel.description: Recent content in reflections on MHTN Lab

item.title: Calulator Display Segments, Side Effects, and Side Channel Attacks
item.description: This week, it happened. Just like clockwork the gears of my mind began to turn. Side channels, a concept once all too unfamiliar finally revelead its secrets to me, unravelling in all its beauty, while revisiting the basics of computer hardware.

item.title: Black Screens, Broken Computers, Virtual Machines and GPU Passthrough
item.description: While learning about virtual machines, I came across an interesting concept - virtual machine hardening. This practice involves measures to protect virtual machines from threats by:

item.title: You are a network
item.description: Introduction Your entire body is a large system of multiple networks of subsystems that work together to keep you alive.

item.title: On Learning
item.description: Preface Hey, you! Yes, you- I’m doing something new. You’ve stumbled upon my first public journal entry. I’m not sure what prompted me to start writing out my thoughts - I’m not even sure I will continue to write them down.
